description: McKay-Thompson series of class 24D for the Monster group.
comments: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) := Prod_{k>=1} (1-(-q)^k) (see A121373), phi(q) := theta_3(q) := Sum_{k=-oo..oo} q^(k^2) (A000122), psi(q) := Sum_{k=0..oo} q^(k*(k+1)/2) (A010054), chi(q) := Prod_{k>=0} (1+q^(2k+1)) (A000700).
links: D. Ford, J. McKay and S. P. Norton, More on replicable functions, Commun. Algebra 22, No. 13, 5175-5193 (1994).
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
Index entries for McKay-Thompson series for Monster simple group
formula: Expansion of chi(-x) * chi(-x^2) * chi(-x^3) * chi(-x^6) in powers of x where chi() is a Ramanujan theta function. - _Michael Somos_, Mar 06 2011Expansion of q^(1/2) * eta(q) * eta(q^3) / (eta(q^4) * eta(q^12)) in powers of q. - _Michael Somos_, Mar 06 2011Euler transform of period 12 sequence [ -1, -1, -2, 0, -1, -2, -1, 0, -2, -1, -1, 0, ...]. - _Michael Somos_, Mar 06 2011G.f. is a period 1 Fourier series which satisfies f(-1 / (48 t)) = 4 / f(t) where q = exp(2 Pi i t). - _Michael Somos_, Mar 06 2011Convolution square is A187196. a(n) = (-1)^n * A112165(n). - _Michael Somos_, Mar 06 2011
mathematica: QP = QPochhammer; s = QP[q]*(QP[q^3]/(QP[q^4]*QP[q^12])) + O[q]^70; CoefficientList[s, q] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 13 2015, from 2nd formula *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 27 2000
